meanings.definition: A concretion of concentrically arranged calcareous matter in the form of a pea.
meanings.sent1: The beach was covered in tiny pisoliths, resembling little pebbles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists found pisoliths in the cave, studying their unique formation.
meanings.sent3: The curious child mistook the pisoliths for candy, trying to pick them up.
meanings.sent4: The pisoliths in the soil were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The garden path was paved with shimmering pisoliths, creating a magical atmosphere.
